006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.StringAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLineAdapter;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.JsonGroupAsBehavior;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValue;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValues;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundAssembly;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundField;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.GroupAs;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.ValueConstraints;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.IConfigurableMessageConstraintBase;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.ITargetedConstraintBase;
027
028import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
029import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
030
031import java.util.LinkedList;
032import java.util.List;
033
034@SuppressWarnings({
035    "PMD.DataClass",
036    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
037})
038@MetaschemaAssembly(
039    formalName = "Value Matches Constraint",
040    name = "targeted-matches-constraint",
041    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
042public class TargetedMatchesConstraint
043    implements IBoundObject, ITargetedConstraintBase, IConfigurableMessageConstraintBase {
044  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
045
046  @BoundFlag(
047      formalName = "Constraint Identifier",
048      name = "id",
049      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
050  private String _id;
051
052  @BoundFlag(
053      formalName = "Constraint Severity Level",
054      name = "level",
055      defaultValue = "ERROR",
056      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
057      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR, values = {
058          @AllowedValue(value = "CRITICAL",
059              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a serious fault in the content that will prevent typical use of the content."),
060          @AllowedValue(value = "ERROR",
061              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a fault in the content. This may include issues around compatibility, integrity, consistency, etc."),
062          @AllowedValue(value = "WARNING",
063              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a potential issue with the content."),
064          @AllowedValue(value = "INFORMATIONAL",
065              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a point of interest."),
066          @AllowedValue(value = "DEBUG",
067              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a fault in the content that may warrant review by a developer when performing model or tool development.") })))
068  private String _level;
069
070  @BoundFlag(
071      formalName = "Matches Regular Expression",
072      name = "regex",
073      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
074  private String _regex;
075
076  @BoundFlag(
077      formalName = "Matches Data Type",
078      name = "datatype",
079      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
080      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR,
081          allowOthers = true,
082          values = { @AllowedValue(value = "base64",
083              description = "The [base64](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#base64) data type."),
084              @AllowedValue(value = "boolean",
085                  description = "The [boolean](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#boolean) data type."),
086              @AllowedValue(value = "date",
087                  description = "The [date](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#date) data type."),
088              @AllowedValue(value = "date-time",
089                  description = "The [date-time](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#date-time) data type."),
090              @AllowedValue(value = "date-time-with-timezone",
091                  description = "The [date-time-with-timezone](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#date-time-with-timezone) data type."),
092              @AllowedValue(value = "date-with-timezone",
093                  description = "The [date-with-timezone](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#date-with-timezone) data type."),
094              @AllowedValue(value = "day-time-duration",
095                  description = "The [day-time-duration](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#day-time-duration) data type."),
096              @AllowedValue(value = "decimal",
097                  description = "The [decimal](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#decimal) data type."),
098              @AllowedValue(value = "email-address",
099                  description = "The [email-address](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#email-address) data type."),
100              @AllowedValue(value = "hostname",
101                  description = "The [hostname](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#hostname) data type."),
102              @AllowedValue(value = "integer",
103                  description = "The [integer](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#integer) data type."),
104              @AllowedValue(value = "ip-v4-address",
105                  description = "The [ip-v4-address](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#ip-v4-address) data type."),
106              @AllowedValue(value = "ip-v6-address",
107                  description = "The [ip-v6-address](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#ip-v6-address) data type."),
108              @AllowedValue(value = "non-negative-integer",
109                  description = "The [non-negative-integer](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#non-negative-integer) data type."),
110              @AllowedValue(value = "positive-integer",
111                  description = "The [positive-integer](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#positive-integer) data type."),
112              @AllowedValue(value = "string",
113                  description = "The [string](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#string) data type."),
114              @AllowedValue(value = "token",
115                  description = "The [token](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#token) data type."),
116              @AllowedValue(value = "uri",
117                  description = "The [uri](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#uri) data type."),
118              @AllowedValue(value = "uri-reference",
119                  description = "The [uri-reference](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#uri-reference) data type."),
120              @AllowedValue(value = "uuid",
121                  description = "The [uuid](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#uuid) data type."),
122              @AllowedValue(value = "base64Binary",
123                  description = "An old name which is deprecated for use in favor of the 'base64' data type."),
124              @AllowedValue(value = "dateTime",
125                  description = "An old name which is deprecated for use in favor of the 'date-time' data type."),
126              @AllowedValue(value = "dateTime-with-timezone",
127                  description = "An old name which is deprecated for use in favor of the 'date-time-with-timezone' data type."),
128              @AllowedValue(value = "email",
129                  description = "An old name which is deprecated for use in favor of the 'email-address' data type."),
130              @AllowedValue(value = "nonNegativeInteger",
131                  description = "An old name which is deprecated for use in favor of the 'non-negative-integer' data type."),
132              @AllowedValue(value = "positiveInteger",
133                  description = "An old name which is deprecated for use in favor of the 'positive-integer' data type.") })))
134  private String _datatype;
135
136  @BoundFlag(
137      formalName = "Constraint Target Metapath Expression",
138      name = "target",
139      required = true,
140      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
141  private String _target;
142
143  @BoundField(
144      formalName = "Formal Name",
145      description = "A formal name for the data construct, to be presented in documentation.",
146      useName = "formal-name")
147  private String _formalName;
148
149  @BoundField(
150      formalName = "Description",
151      description = "A short description of the data construct's purpose, describing the constructs semantics.",
152      useName = "description",
153      typeAdapter = MarkupLineAdapter.class)
154  private MarkupLine _description;
155
156  @BoundAssembly(
157      formalName = "Property",
158      useName = "prop",
159      maxOccurs = -1,
160      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "props", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
161  private List<Property> _props;
162
163  @BoundField(
164      formalName = "Constraint Condition Violation Message",
165      useName = "message")
166  private String _message;
167
168  @BoundField(
169      formalName = "Remarks",
170      description = "Any explanatory or helpful information to be provided about the remarks parent.",
171      useName = "remarks")
172  private Remarks _remarks;
173
174  public TargetedMatchesConstraint() {
175    this(null);
176  }
177
178  public TargetedMatchesConstraint(IMetaschemaData data) {
179    this.__metaschemaData = data;
180  }
181
182  @Override
183  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
184    return __metaschemaData;
185  }
186
187  @Override
188  public String getId() {
189    return _id;
190  }
191
192  public void setId(String value) {
193    _id = value;
194  }
195
196  @Override
197  public String getLevel() {
198    return _level;
199  }
200
201  public void setLevel(String value) {
202    _level = value;
203  }
204
205  public String getRegex() {
206    return _regex;
207  }
208
209  public void setRegex(String value) {
210    _regex = value;
211  }
212
213  public String getDatatype() {
214    return _datatype;
215  }
216
217  public void setDatatype(String value) {
218    _datatype = value;
219  }
220
221  @Override
222  public String getTarget() {
223    return _target;
224  }
225
226  public void setTarget(String value) {
227    _target = value;
228  }
229
230  @Override
231  public String getFormalName() {
232    return _formalName;
233  }
234
235  public void setFormalName(String value) {
236    _formalName = value;
237  }
238
239  @Override
240  public MarkupLine getDescription() {
241    return _description;
242  }
243
244  public void setDescription(MarkupLine value) {
245    _description = value;
246  }
247
248  @Override
249  public List<Property> getProps() {
250    return _props;
251  }
252
253  public void setProps(List<Property> value) {
254    _props = value;
255  }
256
257  /**
258   * Add a new {@link Property} item to the underlying collection.
259   *
260   * @param item
261   *          the item to add
262   * @return {@code true}
263   */
264  public boolean addProp(Property item) {
265    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
266    if (_props == null) {
267      _props = new LinkedList<>();
268    }
269    return _props.add(value);
270  }
271
272  /**
273   * Remove the first matching {@link Property} item from the underlying
274   * collection.
275   *
276   * @param item
277   *          the item to remove
278   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
279   */
280  public boolean removeProp(Property item) {
281    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
282    return _props != null && _props.remove(value);
283  }
284
285  @Override
286  public String getMessage() {
287    return _message;
288  }
289
290  public void setMessage(String value) {
291    _message = value;
292  }
293
294  @Override
295  public Remarks getRemarks() {
296    return _remarks;
297  }
298
299  public void setRemarks(Remarks value) {
300    _remarks = value;
301  }
302
303  @Override
304  public String toString() {
305    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
306  }
307}
